issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In VPCMIDO mode, when an elastic IP is disassociated for an instance and the instance subnet is configured to associate a public IP the state of the public IP is not correctly persisted:

{code}
Sat Oct 10 23:48:47 2015 ERROR [Addresses:Eucalyptus.compute:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#643] [com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java):549] Error storing address 10.116.134.112
com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceException: Unable to find address '10.116.134.112'
        at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.notFoundException(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:50)
        at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.notFoundException(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:31)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:158)
        at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.updateByExample(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:31)
        at com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java:525)
        at com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java:520)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:262)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue$EucaFutureTask.run(Threads.java:696)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:753)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:262)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: example: [AllocatedAddressEntity domain=null instanceId=null instanceUuid=null allocationId=null associationId=null networkInterfaceId=null networkInterfaceOwnerId=null privateAddress=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=10.116.134.112 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.maybeDefinitelyExample(Entities.java:654)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.uniqueResult(Entities.java:607)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions$3.call(Transactions.java:176)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:203)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:173)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:167)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Transactions.one(Transactions.java:152)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.AbstractPersistentSupport.updateByExample(AbstractPersistentSupport.java:156)
        ... 11 more
{code}

the database is missing the instance information for the address and it is incorrectly in the impending state:

{code}
eucalyptus_shared=# 
eucalyptus_shared=# select metadata_display_name, metadata_last_state, metadata_state, metadata_account_id, metadata_user_id, metadata_instance_id, metadata_association_eni_id, metadata_association_private_address from eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_addresses where metadata_display_name = '10.116.134.112';
 metadata_display_name | metadata_last_state | metadata_state | metadata_account_id | metadata_user_id | metadata_instance_id | metadata_association_eni_id | metadata_association_private_address 
-----------------------+---------------------+----------------+---------------------+------------------+----------------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------------------
 10.116.134.112        | impending           | impending      | 000000000000        | eucalyptus       |                      |                             | 
(1 row)

{code}
fields.summary: EC2 VPC public address state persisted incorrectly on EIP disassociate

comments.body:
A fix for this issue can be reviewed here:

https://github.com/sjones4/eucalyptus/commit/ddaea6c971d8b0ec738fbcde9f9065348acad289

The fix is to allocate the system address in a separate thread so it is not part of the enclosing transaction.
To verify, run an instance in a VPC, allocate then associate an elastic IP, and then disassociate the elastic IP and check the cloud-error.log.

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.24039.713.20151013gite09159a.el6

No error thrown in cloud-error.log on EIP disassociation and the DB table appears to have correct information.

A look at the DB table
{code}
eucalyptus_shared=# select metadata_display_name, metadata_last_state, metadata_state, metadata_account_id, metadata_user_id, metadata_instance_id, metadata_association_eni_id, metadata_association_private_address from eucalyptus_cloud.metadata_addresses where metadata_display_name = '10.116.156.12';
 metadata_display_name | metadata_last_state | metadata_state | metadata_account_id |   metadata_user_id    | metadata_instance_id | metadata_association_eni_id | metadata_association_private_address
-----------------------+---------------------+----------------+---------------------+-----------------------+----------------------+-----------------------------+--------------------------------------
 10.116.156.12         | started             | allocated      | 000215996311        | AIDAAXQPF5X2TLEOFTMAA |                      |                             |
(1 row)
{code}

steps taken
{code}
[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-b1501653
RESERVATION	r-7553c003	000215996311	default
INSTANCE	i-b1501653	emi-b251bd70	euca-10-116-156-36.eucalyptus.c-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	running	tk	0		m1.small	2015-10-13T19:17:08.829Z	two				monitoring-disabled	10.116.156.36	172.31.31.181	vpc-d3f4dab4	subnet-de934f22	instance-store					hvm			sg-91e5e1ef				x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-e665a756	subnet-de934f22	vpc-d3f4dab4	000215996311	in-use	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		0	attached	2015-10-13T19:17:08.861Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.156.36		172.31.31.181
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	primary

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-allocate-address
ADDRESS	10.116.156.12	vpc	eipalloc-490520a0

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-associate-address -a eipalloc-490520a0 -i i-b1501653
ADDRESS	i-b1501653	eipalloc-490520a0	eipassoc-744939fe

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-b1501653
RESERVATION	r-7553c003	000215996311	default
INSTANCE	i-b1501653	emi-b251bd70	euca-10-116-156-12.eucalyptus.c-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	running	tk	0		m1.small	2015-10-13T19:17:08.829Z	two				monitoring-disabled	10.116.156.12	172.31.31.181	vpc-d3f4dab4	subnet-de934f22	instance-store					hvm			sg-91e5e1ef				x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-e665a756	subnet-de934f22	vpc-d3f4dab4	000215996311	in-use	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		0	attached	2015-10-13T19:17:08.861Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.156.12	000215996311	172.31.31.181
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	primary

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-disassociate-address 10.116.156.12
ADDRESS	10.116.156.12

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-b1501653
RESERVATION	r-7553c003	000215996311	default
INSTANCE	i-b1501653	emi-b251bd70	euca-10-116-156-68.eucalyptus.c-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	running	tk	0		m1.small	2015-10-13T19:17:08.829Z	two				monitoring-disabled	10.116.156.68	172.31.31.181	vpc-d3f4dab4	subnet-de934f22	instance-store					hvm			sg-91e5e1ef				x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-e665a756	subnet-de934f22	vpc-d3f4dab4	000215996311	in-use	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	true
ATTACHMENT		0	attached	2015-10-13T19:17:08.861Z	true
ASSOCIATION	10.116.156.68		172.31.31.181
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	172.31.31.181	euca-172-31-31-181.eucalyptus.internal	primary
{code}

No error in cloud-error.log (you can see one from before the cloud was updated and this issue was hit but there is not a new one thrown when testing the fix that's why I threw in the date there.)
{code}
[root@g-05-02 ~]# date
Tue Oct 13 12:30:10 PDT 2015

[root@g-05-02 ~]# less /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-error.log | grep address
Tue Oct 13 09:44:48 2015 ERROR [Addresses:Eucalyptus.compute:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#619] [com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java):549] Error storing address 10.116.156.205
com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceException: Unable to find address '10.116.156.205'
	at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.notFoundException(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:50)
	at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.notFoundException(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:31)
	at com.eucalyptus.address.AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.updateByExample(AllocatedAddressPersistenceImpl.java:31)
	at com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java:525)
	at com.eucalyptus.address.Addresses$5.call(Addresses.java:520)
{code}
